generated_text:
{
    "title": "Pierogies Over Rice",
    "serving_size": 4,
    "ingredients": {
        "Pierogies": "1 package",
        "White Rice": "2 cups",
        "Butter": "2 tbsp",
        "Onion": "1, chopped",
        "Garlic": "2 cloves, minced",
        "Chicken": "1 lb, cooked and shredded",
        "Olive Oil": "2 tbsp",
        "Salt": "1 tsp",
        "Pepper": "1/2 tsp",
        "Parsley": "2 tbsp, chopped"
    },
    "instructions": [
        "Cook white rice according to package instructions.",
        "In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat.",
        "Add chopped onion and minced garlic to the skillet and cook until softened.",
        "Add cooked and shredded chicken to the skillet, season with salt and pepper, and cook for an additional 5 minutes.",
        "In a separate skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.",
        "Cook pierogies in the skillet according to package instructions until browned on both sides.",
        "Serve pierogies over a bed of white rice, topped with the chicken mixture.",
        "Garnish with chopped parsley before serving."
    ]
}
